content.text: If a player has already selected a character when it is his turn to play a tile, he takes one of the six visitor/mission chits and puts it in one of the small boxes in the bottom row of the Dwellings section.

subsections.title: The player can take any available visitor/mission chit that has not already been put in a box

content.text: All six visitor/mission chits are used, and they can be placed either side up.

subsections.title: The player can put the chit in any empty box he chooses in the bottom row of the Dwelling section

content.text: He cannot put it in a box that already contains a chit (each box can hold only one chit).

subsections.title: Once placed in a box, the chit remains in that box until it moves to the map during the game

content.text: The chit stays in its assigned box until it is moved to the map during gameplay.
